parameters.name: ac_only
parameters.description: Get AC test types only. remove this query when not used

parameters.name: therapy_only
parameters.description: Get Thearpy test types only. remove this query when not used

parameters.name: regular_only
parameters.description: Get Regular test types only. remove this query when not used

parameters.name: b2c
parameters.description: Get B2C test types only. remove this query when not used

parameters.name: w_trashed_types
parameters.description: Make sure the item still has active relation with Test Types item. remove this query when not used

parameters.name: except_type[]
parameters.description: Get items except this type_id's. remove this query when not used

parameters.name: w_level
parameters.description: Append level pacakges info to each items. remove this query when not used

resources.name: Create

params.name: file_interview[]
params.description: Array of uploaded file interview (supported file extension: pdf,csv,jpg,docs,xls,xlsx,pdf,doc,docx,txt,jpg,jpeg,png,bmp,ppt,pptx,zip,rar)

params.name: candidates[]
params.description: Array of candidate info (requried array keys: name, email, phone, password)

params.name: file_candidate
params.description: Excel file which contains candiate info (must use provided excel template)

params.name: start_test_therapy
params.description: Array of timestamp following type_therapy_id index. required if type_therapy_id present

params.name: finish_test_therapy
params.description: Array of timestamp following type_therapy_id index. required if type_therapy_id present

params.name: template_code
params.description: new email template code. If present, it will create new email template test invitation

params.name: template_content
params.description: custom email body for test invitation

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: show items start by offset number

parameters.name: total_test
parameters.description: show total tests by status (available for 0 or 1 or boolean)

parameters.name: excel
parameters.description: required with start_date and finish_date. filter items by between date range of start_date and end_date  (available for 0 or 1 or boolean)

parameters.name: datatables
parameters.description: tell query that the results will be used by datatables (jquery plugin)

parameters.name: search[value]
parameters.description: required with datatables. search by nit, user name, user email

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: filter items by company_id but used withoud "userRequest"

resources.name: Fetch

Example: `/open-api/v1/test/{TEST ID OR NIT}`

resources.name: Retake & Reset
resources.description:
Reset test that already started

Example: `/open-api/v1/test/reschedule`

**Success response:**
```
{
	"type": "success",
	"message": "Data berhasil di reset"
}
```

resources.name: Append Test
resources.description:
Append test type for an existing test schedule

Example: `/open-api/v1/test/append`

**Success response:**
```
{
	"message": "Data Berhasil diperbaharui"
}
```

resources.name: Fetch All

parameters.name: flag
parameters.description: search by flag (available for recruitment and test)

parameters.name: _with
parameters.description: Append related data, separated by comma. currently only available for "translate" data only

resources.name: Fetch All
resources.description:
List Psikogram templates by Company ID. Support pagination

Example: `/open-api/v1/company/{COMPANY ID}/psikogram/templates`

**Success response:**
```
{
	"items": [
		{
			"id": 35,
			"company_id": 1,
			"position_id": 90,
			"level_id": 1,
			"name": "Psikogram HCC - Manager",

			"type_template": 1,
			"created_by": 29385,
			"position": {

			},

				"phone": "08111720171",
				"email": "hcc@hcc.co.id",
				"logo": "https:\/\/hcc.sgp1.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com\/local\/companies\/OTC\/assets\/images\/1711631782-img20230925090532.jpg",

resources.name: Fetch
resources.description:
Get Psikgoram Template info by Psikogram Template ID.

Example: `/open-api/v1/psikogram/template/{TEMPLATE ID}`

**Success response:**
```
{
	"id": 35,
	"company_id": 1,
	"position_id": 90,
	"level_id": 1,
	"name": "Psikogram HCC - Manager",
	"is_default": 0,
	"max_scale": 5,
	"min_scale": 1,
	"type_template": 1,
	"created_by": 29385
}
```
